Metadata.dc:title:
informations.
#
LIST=`cat $TMPFILE2`
    for ht in $LIST; do
        awk '// \
             { gsub(//, ""); print }' $ht;
        echo $ht;
        echo
    done > $TMPFILE1

#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo "  Sorting all entries ..."

#
# Rewrite field/record separator so that we can apply sort command.
#
awk 'BEGIN { FS="\n"; RS=""; OFS=":"; ORS="\n" } \
           { print $1, $2 }' \
    $TMPFILE1 > $TMPFILE0

#
# Sort all lines and make anchor
#

/bin/sort -f -t : $TMPFILE0 | \
    awk -F : '{ gsub(" ", "%20", $2); \
                gsub(" ", "", $1); \
                gsub("&", "", $2); \
                gsub("&", "", $1); \
                print "
